replies.body:
Ok we get it! You are sad because your team was "hacking"


pretty sure he knows too since that post was posted 1 month ago

Every time you post something on a tournament thread you go on bashing about how your team was not hacking but you were DQd. The evidence was obvious in the video. He would've been knocked backed a small bit but in the video he barely got knocked back. He even jumped and got hit and he had no Knockback. 

Please just stop
